import React, { Component, useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { Container, Table } from "react-bootstrap"; import "../../Assets/CitasMedico.css"; import { data } from "../../data/dataCitasMedico"; import { Link, useParams } from "react-router-dom"; //let datos = JSON.parse(JSON.stringify(data)); export default function CitasMedico() { const [citas, setCitas] = useState([]); const [paciente, setPaciente] = useState([]); let {cipa} = useParams(); console.log(cipa) useEffect(() => { fetch(`http://localhost:8080/medico/${cipa}`) .then((response) => response.json()) .then((response) => setCitas(response)); fetch(`http://localhost:8080/medico/cita/`) .then((response) => response.json()) .then((response) => setPaciente(response)); console.log(citas); }, [500]); console.log(`http://localhost:8080/medico/${cipa}`) console.log(citas); return (
